name: Exiled (Rulfo)
description:
Banished from your homeland for your heinous crimes and wishing to gain back your old life among your kin, now you must enter the nearby crypts full of dark creatures with the task of slaying a dreadful dragon and recover the town’s stolen treasure...

Exiled is a Free to Play First Person Horror Game in which you wield your sword to defend against your foes and illuminate the dark corridors you traverse with your torch, but be careful because when your torch runs out of fire, you must find and collect blue candles to be able to reignite it again. 

You can light unlit torches around to illuminate the enviroment, pick up health potions and find notes that will tell more about the history and monsters that delve in the dark labyrinths that await you..

PLAYTIME: between 30 - 45 minutes

CONTROLS:

WASD: Move

F: Light your torch 

R: Reload your torch

E: Interact with objects

If you enjoyed the game please fell free to support me so I can continue making more games like this one in the future!
